column1: 1) Figures for 2011/12 onwards are not directly comparable to earlier years as a Single Individualised Learner Record (ILR) data collection system has been introduced. More information on the Single ILR is available at:

2) Success rates are calculated as the number of learning aims achieved divided by the number of starts, excluding any learners who transferred onto another qualification within the same organisation. Learners who withdrew within the first 6 weeks of the qualification are excluded.
3) For success rate methodology for 2010/11 please see the following paper:
4) For further information on these tables please see the accompanying notes page.
5) The methodology for calculating Education and Training success rates was changed in 2013/14.
